    • CreateSolvedGrid

      public boolean CreateSolvedGrid(LinkedList<Integer> unfilledCellsIndexs)
      Using the list of indices of unfilled Cells, recursively find a valid solved grid via DFS.
      Parameters:
      unfilledCellsIndexs - - List of Cells that are yet to be filled.
      Returns:
      Boolean of whether a valid solution was found.

    • ValidateGrid

      public boolean ValidateGrid()
      Check the grid for repeated numbers in each row, column, and block.
      Returns:
      Boolean of whether the grid is valid.

    • ConvertToBlockCoords

      public int[] ConvertToBlockCoords(int row, int column)
      Convert the coordinates that refer to the row and column to a corresponding block coordinates that refer to the block and offsets within the block.
      Parameters:
      row - - Row coordinate.
      column - - Column coordinate.
      Returns:
      An array that holds the block's row coordinate, column coordinate, Cell's row offset, and Cell's column offset.

      Returns:

      public Cell[][][][] ConvertToGridBlocks(Cell[][] cellsGrid)
      Convert the 2D grid of Cells to a 4D grid of blocks
      Parameters:
      cellsGrid - - 2D grid to convert
      Returns:
      The 4D representation of the grid as blocks

    • UpdatePossibleNumbers

      public void UpdatePossibleNumbers(Cell chosenCell, Integer chosenNumber)
      Update the possible numbers remaining for all Cells in same row, column, and block as the Cell selected
      Parameters:
      chosenCell - - Cell that is selected to set
      chosenNumber - - Value that is set to the Cell
